publication.title: Differential effects of aging and exercise on intra-abdominal adipose arteriolar function and blood flow regulation

results.target: blood flow at rest and during exercise
results.effect: increased perfusion in old sedentary group (OSed)
diminished in OSed vs. YSed AT-resistance arteries

results.target: blood flow at rest and during exercise
results.effect: similar hyperemic response between age groups during exercise (YET, 9.9 ± 0.5 ml·min−1·100−1 g; OET, 8.1 ± 0.9 ml·min−1·100−1 g)
enhanced in OET group relative to OSed
